ygData.subject: Re: New limit discovered
ygData.msgSnippet: ... possibly?  I m all for testing and fixing it, but 21934 is one heck of a number for a stat. Cheating or not, the mouse and finger work would take a while.

> Could you send me a save file with a character of that strength, 
possibly?  I'm all for testing and fixing it, but 21934 is one heck of 
a number for a stat. Cheating or not, the mouse and finger work would 
take a while.

The limit on strength for a soldier was way higher than that so I 
fear you may have to search the code to determine the spots where 
stats are free.  I know a fast way to get that high with any 
individual stat, especially with the information available to you: 
create a saved game file with the stats you wish to test against.  
Surely, it wouldn't be that big of a deal to write a short program 
just to create a saved game file.  The limit on strength for a soldier 
was way higher than that.  

I have no ideas on limits for constitution or dexteriority.  (I never 
could find the limit on armor because I literally ran out of money.)

Of course, you also understand why I propose redoing the picker for 
stats: save time buying stats.
